title: Emmerdale fans furious as Amy blackmails Tracy and accuses her of 'attempted murder'
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Emmerdale fans were left furious as Amy blackmailed Tracy tonight and accused her of "attempted murder".

Tracy ended up accidentally pushing Kerry after she and Amy tried to cage her in the house she discovered the truth about the factory fire.

Kerry was rushed to hospital and, at one point, her condition didn't look good and they weren't sure she was going to make it.

Tracy visited the hospital to check whether she was ok and came face-to-face with a furious Amy, who proceeded to blackmail her.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Amy seethed: "Let me make that clearer - if you call them on us, then we'll call them on you and it will be two against one. So I fancy our chances, actually.

"I wonder what they'll do you for, GBH or attempted murder? I know I'll be pushing for. Now feel free to do one."

And viewers were disgusted at Amy's hypocrisy, flocking to Twitter to comment.

One tweeted: "Tracey should not feel guilty at all she has done nothing wrong #Emmerdale."

While another commented: "Oh for God's sake. Let Kerry die and kill Amy. Both vile characters. Nobody would miss them. #emmerdale."

A third raged: "Amy being holier than thou Unbelievable ! #Emmerdale."

Another remarked: "amy is a hypocritical b**** #Emmerdale."

*Emmerdale airs weekdays at 7pm with additional episodes on Thursdays at 8pm on ITV
description: Tracy ended up accidentally pushing Kerry after she and Amy tried to cage her in the house she discovered the truth
